attributes.action: Stop allowing prostitution to be advertised anywhere, especially in the Job Centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prostitution (sexual activities performed in exchange for remuneration), including, but not limited to, sex, simulated sex, stripping and 'webcam' performers, should not be allowed to be advertised anywhere and should not be encouraged by the UK. Recently, a Job Centre in Cardiff displayed an advert for a webcam sex performer and this petition is in response to the Governments apparent support of this 'industry' and promotion of the decline of moral standards in the UK.
